title: Beloved Husband - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Ancient Times   Apocalypse   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Eidetic Memory   Fantasy World   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Kind Love Interests   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manly Gay Couple   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Music   Mysterious Past   Narcissistic Protagonist   Personality Changes   Poor to Rich   Power Couple   Second Chance   Secret Identity   Secrets   Seme Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Showbiz   Smart Couple   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   Zombies

description:
Yan Jing Ze encountered an accident while escaping with his lover, was accidentally parasitized, and was involved in reincarnations.

He was lost in reincarnation and almost couldn’t wake up, but if he doesn’t wake up again, his dear will be doomed!

So at certain critical moments, the phoenix man who squeezed the bamboo horse, the scumbag who framed the learning God… they all became sober, no, they were “pierced”.

Various scum gong began to spoil their beloved shou crazily.

Story of the amnesiac gong, Yan Jing Ze, transmigrating into multiple worlds as the scum gong of his beloved wife.>
